docs.snippet: With President Trump abandoning leadership of the global order and Mr. Xi challenging it, Europe sees an increased risk to its livelihood and its values.

headline.print_headline: Xi’s Power Grab in China Rattles Europe and Its Hope for an Ally in the Trump Era
headline.main: Europe Once Saw Xi Jinping as a Hedge Against Trump. Not Anymore.

docs.snippet: The Kremlin says it is still open to a summit meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump despite the fact that the U.S. earlier this week ordered the expulsion of 60 Russian diplomats from the country.

headline.print_headline: Kremlin Says It Is Open to Summit With Trump
headline.main: Kremlin Says It Is Open to Summit With Trump

docs.snippet: The former pornographic film actress was recently interviewed by “60 Minutes,” and Colbert was eager to offer his take on the controversy.

headline.print_headline: Stephen Colbert Asks Why Trump Is Scared of Stormy Daniels
headline.main: Stephen Colbert Asks Why Trump Is Scared of Stormy Daniels

docs.snippet: Ms. McDougal is the second woman this month to challenge Trump associates’ efforts to bury stories of extramarital relationships.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Model Sues To Void Muzzle By Trump Ally
headline.main: Ex-Playboy Model Karen McDougal Sues to Speak on Alleged Trump Affair

docs.snippet: President Trump said he will impose tariffs on about $60 billion worth of Chinese imports.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Imposes Tariffs on $60 Billion Worth of Chinese Goods
headline.main: Trump Hits China With Stiff Trade Measures

docs.snippet: The president’s decision to keep the 2,000 troops on the ground for the immediate future came hours after he told a roomful of reporters that “it’s time” to bring American forces home.

headline.print_headline: President Pulls Back From Call for a Total Withdrawal From Syria
headline.main: Trump Drops Push for Immediate Withdrawal of Troops From Syria

docs.snippet: Even with Republicans in charge, the measure increases funding for many programs the president had sought to cut or kill, and in some cases bars him from pursuing his goals.

headline.print_headline: A Republican Budget, but Not Exactly What the President Asked For
headline.main: Spending Plan Passed by Congress Is a Rebuke to Trump. Here’s Why.

docs.snippet: The Trump administration is ending a program that allows citizens of Liberia living in the U.S. to avoid deportation. But it's allowing a one-year "wind-down" period to ease their return.

headline.print_headline: Trump to End Deportation Protection for Liberians
headline.main: Trump to End Deportation Protection for Liberians

docs.snippet: The president’s commentary, made in a Twitter post, comes amid reports that Mr. Trump has expressed an interest in reining in the e-commerce business.

headline.print_headline: In President’s Tirade on Amazon, The Rage Might Be for the C.E.O.
headline.main: Trump Attacks Amazon, Saying It Does Not Pay Enough Taxes

docs.snippet: President Trump pushed back against reports that his White House is in chaos after the resignations of senior staff members.

headline.main: No Chaos in White House, Trump Says, ‘Only Great Energy’
